name: Byte Master
description:
Are you waiting in a queue? In the subway, plane, bus, taxi? Wherever you are – Kill boredom with BYTE MASTER! A fresh combination of puzzle, idle and incremental mechanics!

▼▼▼▼ GAME FEATURES ▼▼▼▼
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
► Lots of idle & incremental devices!
● Collect bytes automatically with upgraded idle devices.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
► Complete missions!
● More missions – more coins.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
► Combo!
● Prove your master skills reaching the higher combo.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
► Variety of Hints!
● Undo, Create, Delete, Disassemble, Swap, Upgrade Tile!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
► Merge the higher numbers with Level-Up!
● Reach the TOP to become Byte Master!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY
● Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one of the higher grade.
● Increase memory capacity (DRIP) to collect more bytes.
● Reach the higher levels to operate the higher numbers.
● Buy and upgrade idle & incremental devices for automatic bytes collecting.
● Buy and upgrade energy generators for automatic bytes collecting when you are not in the game.

NOW, ARE YOU READY FOR THE CHALLENGE?
